location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Thomas H Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Thomas H. Sheridan, Acting Public Secretary at Tauris [Tabriz, Iran] to Lieutenant William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, requesting to credit to His Majesty's Envoy to Persia the sum of 1000 rupees, to be paid into the Company's Treasury at Bushire.
